abstract.t: In Proxy Mobile Internet Protocol version 6 (PMIPv6), each mobilenode attached to a mobile access gateway (MAG) requires separatesignaling. This might result in excessive network signaling if therea large number of mobile nodes attached to a MAG. In this draft weoutline a bulk PBU optimization approach based on bitmap, in order toreduce the signaling load tied to numerous PBUs originating at thesame time.
